org.treetank.cache

Class NodePageContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.cache.NodePageContainer

  • public final class NodePageContainer
extends Object

    NodePageContainer

    This class acts as a container for revisioned NodePages. Each NodePage is stored in a versioned manner. If modifications occur, the versioned NodePages are dereferenced and reconstructed. Afterwards, this container is used to store a complete NodePage as well as one for upcoming modifications. Both NodePages can differ since the complete one is mainly used for read access and the modifying one for write access (and therefore mostly lazy dereferenced). Since objects of this class are stored in a cache, the class has to be serializable.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
